channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Kit out your PlayStation Portal in one fell swoop with this excellent officially licensed accessory bundle discounted at PS Direct
item.description: This PlayStation Portal accessory bundle has all you need to protect your new handheld — and now it's a real bargain at PS Direct.

item.title: The BBC Is Open to Letting Americans Fund ‘Doctor Who’ Again
item.description: The BBC's Lindsay Salt called the show a 'treasured brand' and is open to another collaboration even after its Disney drama.

item.title: 6 Best 2-in-1 Laptops (2026), WIRED-Approved and Tested
item.description: These 2-in-1 computers upgrade the norm with touchscreen displays, 360-degree hinges, and detachable keyboards.

item.title: The AeroPress just got a stainless steel upgrade — and it’s perfect for travel
item.description: The iconic coffee brewer is now available in vacuum-insulated stainless steel, with an extra-large capacity for bigger brews anywhere.

item.title: Goodbye Xbox? Xbox co-creator suggests Microsoft Gaming will be 'sunsetted' under new CEO as the company pivots to pushing AI — 'The job of all these people is to just gently usher all of these business units into the new world of AI'
item.description: The original Xbox console designer, Seamus Blackley, says Microsoft will eventually sunset its gaming business following the retirement of Xbox Gaming CEO Phil Spencer and the replacement of CoreAI division executive Asha Sharma.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Book 6 series will be available in the US starting on March 11
item.description: You can get any of the Samsung Galaxy Book 6 models in the US, starting on March 11. In fact, you can make a reservation right now through Samsung’s website and its experience stores. The company launched the Book 6 series of laptops, namely the basic Book 6, the Book 6 Pro and the Book 6 Ultra, at CES earlier this year. They’re powered by Intel’s new Core Ultra Series 3 processors, which were also announced at CES and which promise great graphics and battery life. All three models come in grey and with AI features, such as AI Select and Search that you can use to look for information using na...

item.title: Gemini 3.1 Pro vs Gemini 3 Pro: Google’s new AI is slower on purpose — and smarter for it
item.description: Testing Gemini 3.1 Pro against Gemini 3 Pro in a round of creative prompts

item.title: Pourquoi la ROG Xbox Ally n’avait aucune chance face au Steam Deck de Valve
item.description: La ROG Xbox Ally de Microsoft n'aurait pas du tout inquiété Valve et son Steam Deck selon l'analyste Mat Piscatella.

item.title: 'Social advertising is being used to defraud at scale across some of the largest platforms.': Nearly one in three Meta ads reportedly point to a scam, phishing or malware
item.description: Scam ads create millions of impressions every month, tricking users into downloading malware, and more.

item.title: Fellow Series 1 Espresso Machine Review (2026): Excellent, but a Work in Progress
item.description: Fellow’s new espresso machine offers capabilities previously seen only in commercial machines. Some of those are still being fleshed out.

item.title: Summer Game Fest officially returns this summer with all-new game announcements — here's when you can watch the showcase
item.description: Summer Game Fest 2026 officially kicks off this summer, followed by the invite-only Play Days event and The Game Business conference, and its host, Geoff Keighley, has promised all-new game announcements.

item.title: The Morning After: What to expect at Samsung’s Galaxy Unpacked event tomorrow
item.description: Samsung’s ready to launch its first new devices of 2026, and it’s got an Unpacked event in San Francisco to stream everything. The keynote starts at 10AM PT (1PM ET) and will be livestreamed on YouTube. The announcement on February 10 also said this launch will mark “a new phase in the era of AI as intelligence becomes truly personal and adaptive.” What are we expecting? Based on leaked images of the new lineup, the company is not likely to have radically reinvented the look of the Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+ or Galaxy S26 Ultra, sticking instead with a similar design to the Galaxy S25. We’re expe...

item.title: La piste d’une RTX 5090 Ti ou Titan persiste : un créneau de lancement et des specs se précisent
item.description: La rumeur entourant le lancement d'une nouvelle GeForce RTX 5000 très (très) haut de gamme grossit à mesure que les semaines s'écoulent. Aujourd'hui, on en apprend un peu plus grâce aux informations dénichées par la chaîne YouTube Moore's Law Is Dead.

item.title: Lenovo ThinkPad P16 Gen 3 review: A spectacular spectacle in the mobile workstation world
item.description: The Lenovo ThinkPad P16 Gen 3 is an incredible mobile workstation for the business professional, making 16-inches feel worth it to carry around.

item.title: This incoming Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 rival could have the biggest-ever foldable battery — and beat it in two other ways as well
item.description: The Honor Magic V6 could have a 7,150mAh battery, 120W charging, and other impressive specs.

item.title: The Magic: The Gathering Bloomburrow Play Booster Box is over $60 off at Amazon
item.description: The MTG Bloomburrow Play Booster Box drops to $139.25 at Amazon, saving nearly $65 on 36 packs, and is the lowest 2026 price yet.

item.title: Telegram founder Pavel Durov is reportedly under criminal investigation in Russia
item.description: Pavel Durov, the founder of Telegram, is reportedly under criminal investigation by Russian authorities for “abetting terrorist activities.” According to the Financial Times, state-run publications are accusing Durov of enabling attacks on Russia and Telegram of becoming an intelligence tool for Ukraine and the west. Telegram was one of the apps that Russia blocked in the country just a few days ago, along with WhatsApp, in what seemed to be an effort to push local users towards the unencrypted state-owned app, Max. When Telegram was banned, pro-Russian voices criticized the country’s decision...

item.title: Amazon retire 200 € sur l’Asus Zenbook 14 doté d’un bel écran OLED de 14″ et d’une puce Ryzen AI 7
item.description: Grâce à sa dalle OLED, son format compact et son autonomie de plus de 15 heures, ce Zenbook 14 d'Asus est un laptop à emmener partout. Sur Amazon, il tombe à 899,99 euros.

item.title: La mauvaise surprise des Galaxy S26 : leur batterie vieillirait beaucoup plus vite
item.description: Les dernières fuites révèlent un choix surprenant pour les futurs Galaxy S26. L'autonomie par charge serait en forte progression, mais la longévité globale de la batterie s'effondrerait.

item.title: Smartphone reconditionné en 2026 : notre sélection des meilleurs modèles que nous recommandons
item.description: Faire des économies tout en préservant un peu la planète, c'est la promesse du smartphone reconditionné. En 2026, choisir un appareil remis à neuf permet de profiter de technologies récentes à prix cassé, sans le coût écologique du neuf. Découvrez notre guide comparatif des meilleurs modèles de téléphones reconditionnés à acheter cette année.

item.title: Why ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Didn’t Use the Books’ Title
item.description: Showrunner Ira Parker reveals 'Tales of Dunk and Egg' author George R.R. Martin weighed in very early in the process.

item.title: Salsa Wanderosa Electric Bike Review: Full-Suspension Drop-Bar Gravel Ride
item.description: It’s a drop-bar electric mountain bike! It’s a full-suspension electric gravel bike! It’s everything at once, and it’s awesome.

item.title: Best built-in parental control app
item.description: A comparison of the best built-in parental control apps, covering their features, pros, cons, and which app is ideal for your needs.

item.title: Google Messages is finally getting a location-sharing upgrade that we've been waiting years for
item.description: It looks as though Google Messages is getting real-time location sharing very soon, and there's a tweak to group chats too.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 : une meilleure autonomie mais une batterie moins endurante
item.description: À l’aube de l’annonce des Samsung Galaxy S26, une nouvelle fuite nous livre des informations sur les batteries de cette nouvelle gamme. Si on peut s’attendre à une meilleure autonomie sur tous les modèles, la longévité de la batterie laisserait à désirer.

item.title: Jon Stewart goes on a brutal 3-minute rant about Punch the monkey
item.description: Jon Stewart took a brief pause from talking about Donald Trump to go on a rant about Punch the monkey during Monday night's "Daily Show".

item.title: Cord cutters should get a digital antenna if they havent already
item.description: Every cord cutter should have a digital antenna. Here's why and what you should look for.

item.title: The Magic: The Gathering Lorwyn Eclipsed Play Booster Box hits its record-low price at Amazon — save almost $40
item.description: The Lorwyn Eclipsed Play Booster Box drops to $124.98 at Amazon — its lowest price ever and even beating market price on TCGplayer.

item.title: « Eh bien, Mullvad a été censuré au Royaume-Uni » : ce VPN voit ses publicités sur la surveillance d’Internet interdites
item.description: Mesure sévère mais juste ou dérive inquiétante ? Au Royaume-Uni, les élus s'apprêtent à interdire l'accès des VPN aux mineurs de moins de 15 ans. Un contexte de recul des droits numériques dans lequel Mullvad VPN s'est littéralement vu réduit au silence.

item.title: The Segway Cube 2000 power station is down to its lowest-ever price at Amazon — save over $350
item.description: As of Feb. 24, the Segway Portable Power Station Cube 2000 is discounted to $538.99 at Amazon. This is 40% off its list price of $899.99.

item.title: Dans cette entreprise, refuser d’utiliser l’IA, c’est s’assoir sur son augmentation de salaire
item.description: Pour espérer grimper les derniers échelons de la direction, les cadres supérieurs de ce géant du conseil n'ont désormais plus le choix : ils doivent prouver qu'ils maîtrisent et utilisent régulièrement les outils d'IA.

item.title: Amazon is shutting down King of Meat, promising a 'full refund' for 'all players'
item.description: King of Meat is shutting down after less than a year on the market.

item.title: Amazon Games is winding down King of Meat
item.description: King of Meat's reign is ending. The game will end service on April 9, less than a year after its October 2025 debut. The Amazon Games-published title will be playable until that date, but will then be taken entirely offline. "Despite the creativity and innovation Glowmade brought to King of Meat, the game has unfortunately not found the audience we hoped for," the announcement read. Developer Glowmade had high hopes for King of Meat, its debut game, but it fell starkly short of expectations. The developer wanted a concurrent player count of at least 100,000, but peaked at 320, according to I...

item.title: The Best Laptop Tote Bags to Buy (2026), WIRED-Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From travel days to board meetings, these laptop totes are designed to protect your valuables, and then some.

item.title: Can’t find an apartment in San Francisco? Go ahead and blame AI
item.description: San Francisco’s AI boom is bringing jobs to the city, raising rents, and heating up an already hot housing market. When looking for an apartment in San Francisco today, artificial intelligence can seem inescapable; and that’s not just because every rental building seems to have an AI bot answering calls.

item.title: Walmart is dropping exclusive Pokémon TCG collectibles for Pokémon Day 2026 — heres how to buy
item.description: For four days, Walmart is dropping exclusive Pokémon TCG collectibles for Walmart+ members.

item.title: Google Pixel Watch (and other Wear OS users) just got a potentially life-saving new upgrade
item.description: Wear OS users can get earthquake alerts on watch – even if you're nowhere near your phone.

item.title: Samsung 65QN90F : l’un des TV les plus lumineux du marché voit son prix chuter drastiquement après 40 % de remise
item.description: Le TV Samsung 65QN90F est un modèle Mini-LED qui nous a clairement impressionnés : dalle ultra-lumineuse, fonctionnalités gaming complètes, design très élégant... Bref, voilà une référence qui a tout bon. Actuellement, Son-Vidéo le propose d'ailleurs à 1 390 euros au lieu de 2 290 euros grâce à un code promo.

item.title: Want premium PS5 accessories for less? These Nacon controllers, as well as my favorite wireless gaming headset, are $50 off or better at PS Direct and Amazon
item.description: Several Nacon PS5 accessories have been discounted at PS Direct, including the Revolution 5 Pro controller and my favorite wireless gaming headset.

item.title: L’énigme des « bonhommes de neige » de l’espace trouve enfin une piste solide
item.description: La mission New Horizon, après son formidable succès avec ses images de Pluton, a découvert il y a plus d'une décennie le premier représentant d'une population d'étranges astéroïdes binaires en contact. Depuis, les astrophysiciens tentent de trouver la clé de l'énigme de leur origine.

item.title: Volkswagen cartonne, Renault confirme et Tesla poursuit sa chute : sacré début d’année dans les ventes de voitures électriques en Europe
item.description: En ce début d'année 2026, le marché européen des voitures électriques connaît une recomposition. Volkswagen conserve son trône, mais c'est désormais Renault et Skoda qui jouent les trouble-fêtes, pendant que Tesla poursuit une descente aux enfers.
